townsfolk.name: Washerwoman
townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

townsfolk.name: Librarian
townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 or 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

townsfolk.name: Investigator
townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

townsfolk.name: Chef
townsfolk.description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

rules.context: There are ${0} pairs of evil players.

townsfolk.name: Empath
townsfolk.description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

rules.context: ${0} of your alive neighbors are evil.

townsfolk.name: Fortune Teller
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

rules.context: There ${0 ? "is" : "is not"} a Demon among the players you selected.

townsfolk.name: Undertaker
townsfolk.description: Each night (but not the first night), you learn which character died by execution today.

rules.context: The player executed last night was the ${0}.

townsfolk.name: Monk
townsfolk.description: Each night (but not the first night), choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon today.

townsfolk.name: Ravenkeeper
townsfolk.description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

townsfolk.name: Virgin
townsfolk.description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

rules.content: ${2} accused the Virgin ${1}, and will hereby be executed instead.

townsfolk.name: Slayer
townsfolk.description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

townsfolk.name: Soldier
townsfolk.description: You are safe from the Demon.

townsfolk.name: Mayor
townsfolk.description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

outsiders.name: Butler
outsiders.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

outsiders.name: Drunk
outsiders.description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

outsiders.name: Recluse
outsiders.description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

outsiders.name: Saint
outsiders.description: If you die by execution, your team loses.

minions.name: Poisoner
minions.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

minions.name: Spy
minions.description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

minions.name: Baron
minions.description: There are extra Outsiders in play. (+2 Outsiders)

minions.name: Scarlet Woman
minions.description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)

demon.name: Imp
demon.description: Each night (but not the first night), choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

travelers.name: Thief
travelers.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.

travelers.name: Bureaucrat
travelers.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

travelers.name: Gunslinger
travelers.description: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.

travelers.name: Scapegoat
travelers.description: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

travelers.name: Beggar
travelers.description: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober & healthy.

townsfolk.name: Grandmother
townsfolk.description: You start knowning a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

townsfolk.name: Sailor
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

townsfolk.name: Chambermaid
townsfolk.description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

townsfolk.name: Exorcist
townsfolk.description: Each night (but not the first night), choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

townsfolk.name: Innkeeper
townsfolk.description: Each night (but not the first night), choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

townsfolk.name: Gambler
townsfolk.description: Each night (but not the first night), choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

townsfolk.name: Gossip
townsfolk.description: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

townsfolk.name: Courtier
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

townsfolk.name: Professor
townsfolk.description: Once per game, at night (but not the first night), choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

townsfolk.name: Minstrel
townsfolk.description: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

townsfolk.name: Tea Lady
townsfolk.description: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

townsfolk.name: Pacifist
townsfolk.description: Executed good players might not die.

townsfolk.name: Fool
townsfolk.description: The 1st time you die, you don't.

outsiders.name: Goon
outsiders.description: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

outsiders.name: Lunatic
outsiders.description: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

outsiders.name: Tinker
outsiders.description: You might die at any time.

outsiders.name: Moonchild
outsiders.description: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

minions.name: Godfather
minions.description: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. (-1 or +1 Outsider)

minions.name: Devil's Advocate
minions.description: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

minions.name: Assassin
minions.description: Once per game, at night (but not the first night), choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

minions.name: Mastermind
minions.description: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

demon.name: Zombuul
demon.description: Each night (but not the first night), if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

demon.name: Pukka
demon.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

demon.name: Shabaloth
demon.description: Each night (but not the first night), choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

demon.name: Po
demon.description: Each night (but not the first night), you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

travelers.name: Apprentice
travelers.description: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).

travelers.name: Matron
travelers.description: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.

travelers.name: Judge
travelers.description: Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.

travelers.name: Voudon
travelers.description: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.

travelers.name: Bishop
travelers.description: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.
